Title: El rey del río
Writer: Rafael Azcona, José Luis García Sánchez (story), Manuel Gutiérrez Aragón (story)
Actors: Alfredo Landa, Carmen Maura, Gustavo Salmerón, Ana Álvarez
Plot: An air-hostess is pregnant but she does not know the name of the father, a foreigner. When the baby is born, she gives it to her sister that has already two children. The child grows up as ...
